GSD.description:
ALSA: hda: fix potential memleak in 'add_widget_node'

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.9 by commit 455d99bd6baf19688048b6d42d9fa74eae27f93b. For more details please see the references link.
